name: Head in the stars - ROBLOX THEME
description:
Originally created for someone named Kaori as a request, but this is by far the BIGGEST theme I've created. Just to put this out there, I do not own the image used and am not making any profits off of this theme whatsoever. With that being said, I hope you enjoy it!

Some comments are saying it doesn't work, and to that, I have no way to help. This theme is made for desktop so I'm not sure if it even works with mobile, but it works fine for me and others when we use it. I've had no issues applying the theme to my roblox website so I don't know how to troubleshoot it for you if it isn't working.

discussions.name: It's very cute :D it also works so yeee
Pls fix the white thing on the left
